233.レストリア平野にある 遺跡を調査せよ。:
Explore the ruins in the Restoria
Plains.

262.シュタール鉱野で 空に浮かんだ\n珍しい色の結晶を調査せよ。:
Investigate the oddly-colored
crystals above Stahl Minefield.

305.ムニエカ地方で\nピンク色の蝶を調査せよ。:
Investigate the pink butterflies
in the Munieka region.

335.ウォルド地方にある 遺跡を調査せよ。:
Explore the ruins in the Angefall
region.

363.レストリア平野にある 巨石群を調査し\n適切な しぐさをせよ。:
Investigate the megalith in the
Restoria Plains and perform the
correct emote.

408.タービア草原にある大木の\n頂上からの景色を 調査し\n適切な しぐさをせよ。:
Examine the view from a large tree in
the Turbia Meadows and perform
the correct emote.

462.ムニエカ地方にある 崩れた橋を調査し\n適切な しぐさをせよ。:
Investigate the collapsed bridge in the
Munieka region and perform the
correct emote.

507.タービア草原にある 牧場を\n調査に向かった 調査員の行方を探せ。:
Search for the researcher who went
off to the ranch in the Turbia Meadows.

555.ラランブラ山道にある 古びた小屋の\n調査に向かった 調査員の行方を探せ。:
Search for the researcher who went
off to the old cabin on the Larambla
Trail.

609.ウォルド地方にある 崩れた塔の\n調査に向かった調査員に\n物資を補給せよ。:
Provide supplies to the investigators
at the collapsed tower in the
Angelfall region.

662.レストリア平野で\n一番遅いモンスターを１匹\n討伐せよ。:
Defeat the slowest monster in the
Restoria Plains once.

701.シュタール鉱野で\n一番生息数が少ないモンスターを\n１匹討伐せよ。:
Defeat the rarest monster that dwells
in the Stahl Minefield once.

748.タービア草原で\n一番生息数が多いモンスターを\n１匹討伐せよ。:
Defeat the most common monster that
dwells in the Turbia Meadows once.

792.ラランブラ山道で\n一番軽いモンスターを１匹\n討伐せよ。:
Defeat the monster that weighs the
least on the Larambla Trail once.

831.ムニエカ地方で\n一番素早いモンスターを１匹\n討伐せよ。:
Defeat the quickest monster in the
Munieka region once.

870.ウォルド地方で\n一番重いモンスターを１匹\n討伐せよ。:
Defeat the monster that weighs the
most in the Angelfall region once.

908.シュタール鉱野で\nモンスターを１２匹\n討伐せよ。:
Defeat 12 monsters in the Stahl
Minefield.

943.タービア草原で\nモンスターを１２匹\n討伐せよ。:
Defeat 12 monsters in the Turbia
Meadows.

976.ラランブラ山道で\nモンスターを１２匹\n討伐せよ。:
Defeat 12 monsters on the Larambla
Trail.

1011.ウォルド地方で\nモンスターを１２匹\n討伐せよ。:
Defeat 12 monsters in the Angelfall
region.

1044.レストリア平野で 深緑の豊かな尻尾を\n持つモンスターを１匹討伐せよ。:
Defeat a monster with a lush and deep
green tail in the Restoria Plains.

1095.シュタール鉱野で 反省会をする\nモンスターを１匹討伐せよ。:
Defeat a monster in a meeting in the
Stahl Minefield.

1138.ラランブラ山道で 天才を自認する\nモンスターを１匹討伐せよ。:
Defeat a monster that's a
self-proclaimed genius on the Larambla
Trail.

1183.ムニエカ地方で 冒険者を収穫する\nモンスターを１匹討伐せよ。:
Defeat a monster that "harvests"
adventurers in the Munieka region.

1228.ウォルド地方で 鳴き声が\n名前になったモンスターを１匹\n討伐せよ。:
Defeat a monster whose color matches
its attitude in the Angelfall region.

1292.レストリア平野の ラランブラ山道への\n入り口付近に 遺跡らしき建造物を\n見か:
I spotted what look to be ruins in the
Restoria Plains, near the Larambla
Trail. They may be crucial to Zeniath's
history, so I'd like you to
investigate.

1430.シュタール鉱野の ハディン採石場の\n入り口から 南東のあたりに\n珍しい色の結:
Southeast of the Hadine Quarry's
entrance are large, floating crystals
with unusual colors. They may be
remains of the Dia Kut, so I'd like
you to investigate them.

1574.ムニエカ地方の 東部の海岸線付近で\nピンク色の蝶の群れを 見かけましたが\nど:
I've spotted a swarm of pink
butterflies near the Munieka region's
eastern coastline. They appear to be
not native to Astoltia, so I'd like you
to investigate this possibly new
species.

1726.ウォルド地方の 南東の端の方に\n苔むした 相当に古そうな\n遺跡らしきものを:
In the Angellfall region's southeast
corner, I came across ancient, moss-
covered ruins. There appear to be
letters carved into them, so they
must have some historic significance.
Please investigate them.

1869.レストリア平野の シュタール鉱野への\n入り口から 北西のあたりに\n奇妙な巨石:
I discovered a megalith in the
southeastern Restoria Plains. It
clearly looks like some kind of man-
made altar. Please head there to
investigate further.

2019.タービア草原の 南東に\nテンシノコシカケと 呼ばれる\nキノコの生えた巨木が:
In the southeast Turbia Meadows is a
large tree that grows mushrooms called
Celestools. As the name suggests, go to
this tree and sit upon a mushroom to
survey the surrounding area.

2151.ムニエカ地方の 南西の海岸線付近に\n崩れてしまった橋が あるようです。\nゼニ:
There is a collapsed bridge near the
Munieka region's southwestern
coastline. To learn more about how
Zeniath's people might have once lived,
I would like you to investigate.

2303.タービア草原の風車の 南西にある牧場に\n向かった調査員から 物資補給依頼です。:
A researcher at the southwestern ranch
in the Turbia Meadows is requesting a
supply shipment. Please deliver one
<%sEV_ITEM> to him.
Why is he asking for sweets?

2437.ラランブラ山道の 北東の端に\n古びた小屋を 見かけたので\n調査員を派遣しまし:
I spotted an old cabin in the
northeastern end of the Larambla Trail.
I sent a researcher to investigate, but
they have not returned, so I'd like you
to go and search form them.
I pray that they are safe...

2557.ウォルド地方で 聖湖ゼニートの\n南西にある草原に 崩れた塔があります。\nそこ:
In the Angelfall region is a collapsed
tower southwest of Lake Zenit. The
researcher I had dispatched there is
requesting supplies. Please head there
and deliver one <%sEV_ITEM>.

2711.モンスターの 討伐をお願いします。\n足がないような モンスターは\nどうしても:
I need you to defeat a monster.
Those without legs give the
impression of moving rather slow.
Because of that, they'll defend
themselves with poison or shrinking
their enemies.

2843.モンスターの 討伐をお願いします。\n数は少ないですが それゆえに目立つ\nとも:
I need you to defeat a monster.
There may not be too many of them, but
that only causes them to stand out all
the more. They have a striking
coloration that can be seen from quite
far...

2943.モンスターの 討伐をお願いします。\nタービア草原では深紅色のコーンが\nよく採:
Please help me to defeat a monster.
I hear it's easy to find crimson-
colored corn in the Turbia Meadows.
I'd really like to try some, too.

3031.モンスターの 討伐をお願いします。\n一番軽いということなので\n身体が小さかっ:
Please help me to defeat a monster.
Apparently it's the lightest one, so I
have a feeling it's either small or it
flies. That gives me the impression
it may be a kind of insect...

3149.モンスターの 討伐をお願いします。\n見た目では 想像できないような\nモンスタ:
Please help me to defeat a monster.
Despite appearances, there are many
such cases where a monster is quicker
than originally thought! Sometimes
they may even dance, or cast spells!

3270.モンスターの 討伐をお願いします。\n身体の大きさや 攻撃の破壊力は\n重さに比:
Please help me to defeat a monster.
Its size and the power of its attacks
may be proportional to its weight!
At least, I think...

3350.モンスターの種類は問いませんので\n討伐を お願いします！:
The type of monster does not matter,
so please defeat any of them for me!

3392.深緑の豊かなしっぽを持つモンスターの\n討伐をお願いします。\n愛らしい見た目に:
I'd like you to defeat a monster that
has a lush, deep green tail. It may
look cute and harmless, but is one
of those monsters that hides a
dastardly demeanor.

3501.モンスターの 討伐をお願いします。\n反省会をするなら できるだけ多く\n人を集:
Please help me to defeat a monster.
If it's going to have a meeting, its
best to gather as many others as
possible, right?

3575.モンスターの 討伐をお願いします。\n賢さのバロメーターといえば\n呪文を 使い:
I need you to defeat a monster.
When it comes to mastering wisdom,
is it measured by a mastery of spells,
I wonder?

3647.モンスターの 討伐をお願いします。\n冒険者を 収穫するなんて、\nよほど 身体:
I need you to defeat a monster.
To "harvest" adventurers, this monster
must be quite big...or just very fond
of adventurers!

3733.鳴き声が 名前になったモンスターの\n討伐を お願いします。\nよほど 特徴的な:
I'd like you to defeat the monster
whose name comes from its color.
It must be quite angry if it's taken on
that color...
